TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITaskItem2 implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem

summary.span: 此接口为 ITaskItem 接口添加转义支持。

span.span: This interface adds escaping support to the ITaskItem interface.

summary.span: 返回此对象的元数据克隆的 ITaskItem2 实现。

span.span: ITaskItem2 implementation which returns a clone of the metadata on this object.

summary.span: 返回的值采用其原始的转义形式。

span.span: Values returned are in their original escaped form.

returns.span: 克隆的元数据，保留了值的转义。

span.span: The cloned metadata, with values' escaping preserved.

summary.span: 获取或设置项包含值，例如对于基于磁盘的项，这将是文件路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the item include value e.g. for disk-based items this would be the file path.

remarks.span: 利用此方法修复属性名称，尽管这并不明显，但它是对项规范的改进。

span.span: Taking the opportunity to fix the property name, although this doesn't make it obvious it's an improvement on ItemSpec.

summary.span: 允许查询此项的元数据的值。

span.span: Allows the values of metadata on the item to be queried.

remarks.span: 因为这并不明显，所以有机会修复属性名称，但这并不明显，这是 GetMetadata 的改进。

span.span: Taking the opportunity to fix the property name, although this doesn't make it obvious it's an improvement on GetMetadata.

summary.span: 允许在此项上设置一段自定义元数据。

span.span: Allows a piece of custom metadata to be set on the item.

summary.span: 假定传入的值未转义，并根据需要将值进行转义以维护其值。

span.span: Assumes that the value passed in is unescaped, and escapes the value as necessary in order to maintain its value.

remarks.span: 因为这并不明显，所以有机会修复属性名称，但这并不明显，这是 SetMetadata 的改进。

span.span: Taking the opportunity to fix the property name, although this doesn't make it obvious it's an improvement on SetMetadata.
